page.title: 15CROHAM HURST_ S.CROYDON
page.content: The name Croham Hurst means "crows enclosure" or "fortified stronghold." It is a hill covered mainly by woodland.At the top is a Bronze Age burial mound,an important part of{ {local history}. The majority of{housing}in the area around Croham Hurst is of a higher standard than others in S.Croydon.The houses are mainly detached with large gardens and four or more bedrooms. The typical{hobbies}of the residents are painting,sailing and walking.People often use this area to spend their leisure time e.g.:walking their dogs,climbing trees and enjoying the wildlife.There is a private{golf {club}which is situated next to Croham Hurst.
